thread.title: What TV channel, time is the New Orleans Saints vs. Dallas Cowboys game on tonight?
thread.title_full: What TV channel, time is the New Orleans Saints vs. Dallas Cowboys game on tonight? | NOLA.com

author: Julie Boudwin, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: What TV channel, time is the New Orleans Saints vs. Dallas Cowboys game on tonight?
text:
The New Orleans Saints (0-3) host the Dallas Cowboys (2-1) Sunday night at 7:30 p.m. CT. Quarterback Drew Brees will be back in action after missing last week's game against the Carolina Panthers due to a shoulder injury.
The game can be seen on NBC.
If you're looking to catch the game and a drink you can use NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune's go-to-bar guide to find the perfect spot in the New Orleans area.
Saints vs. Cowboys game info:
What channel? NBC
What time? 7:30 p.m. CT
What day? Sunday
How to watch online/stream live? NBC Stream
Radio station? WWL Radio 870 AM/105.3 FM with Jim Henderson, Hokie Gajan and Kristian Garic
